stimulusHtml: An object on the end of a spring of force constant k moves in simple harmonic motion with amplitude A and frequency f. Which of the following is a possible expression for the potential energy of the spring as a function of time t ?
choicesHtml: 1 2 k A 2 sin 2 ( 2πft ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4490@

k A 2 cos 2 ( 2πft ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@42C6@

kAsin( 2πft ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@40A7@

1 2 kAcos( 2πft ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4267@

k A ( sin 2 π f t + cos 2 π f t ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@48B9@
